LanguageData.SZMechNeko_OrganicAlloy.label: organic alloy
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_OrganicAlloy.description: A special type of alloy made for ultratech.Withing good toughness and ductility can be used as an excellent fabric material.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoEar.label: neko ear
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoEar.description: A strange aerial. It can transform energy.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoComponent.label: neko component
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoComponent.description: A precision device removed from a mechanical neko seems to be an important part of some kind.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoCore.label: neko core
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_NekoCore.description: The core parts found in large machinery are made of incomprehensible technology and can be used directly in some places.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnergyCube.label: energy cube
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_EnergyCube.description: A special crystal structure, this could storage much energy, but it also could be explosived.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_ULAlloy.label: UL-Alloy
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_ULAlloy.description: A metal with a special crystal structure that is very light in weight and easy to process.
